remarks.para: May be inoperative provided TRIM AIR Switch remains OFF.

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may remain displayed:

numlitem.para: Select AUTO W or AUTO C to control pack outlet temperature. Flight deck temperature remains controllable by the FLT DECK TEMP selector.
Upper Deck Zone, Crew Rest Zone and both Main Deck Cargo Zones receive pack outlet air at the same temperature commanded by the FLT DECK TEMP selector.

placard.para: Placard associated TRIM AIR switch "LEAVE OFF". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
